sentences.en: A Decibel is equal to a shell very.
A measure of sound intensity equivalent to one decibel at 1000 Hz.
sentences.cn: 一种声强的量度单位,其值等价于1000Hz1分贝.

sentences.en: And it analyses the effect of decibel in the EMC test and electromagnetic design.
sentences.cn: 分析了分贝在电焊机电磁兼容测试和电磁兼容设计方面作用.

sentences.en: Decibel one phrase is applied to telephone engineering first in 1924 beginning of years in.
sentences.cn: 分贝一词于1924年首先被应用到电话工程中.

sentences.en: Ear also becomes carried on the back a bit, talking sound grows decibel.
sentences.cn: 耳朵也变得有点背了, 说话的声音长分贝了.

sentences.en: Human's ear usually cannot stand sound over 80 decibel.
sentences.cn: 人类的耳朵通常忍受不了八十分贝以上的声音.

sentences.en: I yell at a decibel machine hysterically, a series of chirps , with unknown tones, till i am voiceless.
sentences.cn: 我对着分贝器歇斯底里的喊"叽里咕噜不知所云的音调"一串一串的喊! 一次都喊到我无法发声为止.

sentences.en: In sound we use the decibel scale.
sentences.cn: 在声学中我们采用分贝标度.

sentences.en: Scientists use a unit of measure called a decibel to measure the loudness of a sound.
sentences.cn: 科学家使用了一种计算单位称为分贝来衡量响度的声音.

sentences.en: Specified as a decibel value over a frequency range.
sentences.cn: 以特定频率范围的分贝值表示.

sentences.en: The decibel is unit that expresses the ration of the magnitude of two electric voltage.
sentences.cn: 分贝是表示两个电压等级数量的单位.

sentences.en: The most usual system is that of the decibel scale.
sentences.cn: 最常用的系统为分贝标度系统.

sentences.en: The noise pollution reached a high decibel levellevel.
sentences.cn: 噪音污染达到了很高分贝.

sentences.en: Toys that make noise can't exceed certain decibel limits.
sentences.cn: 有噪声的玩具不能超过规定的分贝限度.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring the loudness of sound
